text: Gordon Peter Wilkinson, known professionally as Gordon Peters (29 November 1926 - 16 June 2022) was a British television actor who had a long career. He starred in a BBC TV comedy series in 1973 called The Gordon Peters Show. He was known for his roles in Hi-de-Hi!, Dad's Army, Are You Being Served?, Grace & Favour, One Foot in the Grave as Ronnie, Never the Twain, Little Britain, Keeping Up Appearances and HBO's Tales from the Crypt. Peters died on 16 June 2022, aged 95.Gordon Peters ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors
